Kate

messages.subject: Braggy Big Sister
messages.msgSnippet: Hey Kate, Sounds like you have tremendous reason to brag. As far as the kids your younger sister is looking to have someone sponsor....  If she has trouble
messages.messageBody:
Hey Kate,

Sounds like you have tremendous reason to brag.

As far as the kids your younger sister is looking to have someone
sponsor.... If she has trouble finding someone, have her send the
information to me. I know quite a few folks, including myself, who might be
interested.

Julie
